ygData.subject: Re: Skull and Staff repost from previous
ygData.msgSnippet: Here is the post I saw regarding this a few days ago.. and also there was another maybe on a different list that was more indepth even. ... From: Ziffnab
ygData.messageBody:
Here is the post I saw regarding this a few days ago.. and also there was
another maybe on a different list that was more indepth even.



----- Original Message -----
From: Ziffnab MageStorm <eq_ziffnab@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, May 14, 1999 9:50 AM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Staff Question and ANSWER!!!

> From: Ziffnab MageStorm <eq_ziffnab@...>
>
> Ok everyone...
>
> The Skull of Jhen Tra is NOT something you affix to your RTS. This is
> a hand held item (yes it works now) which adds 20 mana and 2 Magic
> resistance. Thats it. You must revert to using piercing or 1h blunt
> or no weapon at all. There is another skull out there which can be
> affixed to a staff but the quest is broken.
>
> (or not implemented)
>
> - Ziffnab of Xegony
